meta.title: From LEGENDS to FABLES
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: Time for another mystery theme! Every Raddle this week (Sunday thru Friday) is part of a secret theme that you can figure out. The answer is a name. When you've solved it, [submit your name here](/mystery/2) to be included in the list of solvers. One correct entry will win a prize.

ladder.clue: Drop a letter from <> to get a device that sounds like "<>"
Change a letter in <> to get offensive
<> {}, useful structures on many baseball fields

ladder.transform: is in the shape of a

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get some stories
